title: Level 7 Diploma in Human Resource Management
shortDescription: Build advanced HR leadership skills with a UK Ofqual-regulated Level 7 Diploma in Human Resource Management (120 credits) and progress to an MBA or MSc top-up.
overview: This Level 7 Diploma in Human Resource Management is an advanced postgraduate qualification designed for aspiring and existing HR managers. It provides 120 credits towards a full MBA, typically requiring a further 60 credits via a dissertation or dissertation plus one module through a university top-up route. Delivered fully online with flexible start dates, the programme consists of six modules and six written assignments. Learners develop strategic capability across people management, employee engagement, organisational learning, performance management, resourcing and reward, employment relations and law, and business research methods. On completion, learners may progress to MBA, MSc, or MA top-up programmes at a range of UK universities, subject to entry requirements.
whoItsFor: Aspiring HR managers, people leaders, HR generalists seeking senior progression, and experienced professionals aiming to gain an MBA or MSc top-up pathway.
whatYoullLearn: Strategic human resource management; employee engagement and organisational learning; leadership development and performance management; global resourcing, talent and reward; employment relations and employment law; business research methods.
entryRequirements: Applicants must be aged 21 or over. Learners are normally expected to hold a Level 6 qualification or a first degree. Applicants with significant professional experience but no formal qualifications may be considered.
duration: Flexible study up to 5 years to complete
delivery: Fully online with guided learning, assignments, webinars, and 1-2-1 tutor support
priceNote: Pricing details are available on our tuition fees page. Flexible payment options are available. A free laptop is included for learners who pay in full (terms and conditions apply).

title: Level 7 Diploma in International Business Law Leading to LLM
shortDescription: Study a UK postgraduate Level 7 Diploma in International Business Law and progress to an LLM through credit transfer routes.
overview: The Level 7 Diploma in International Business Law is a UK postgraduate qualification aligned to the Regulated Qualifications Framework. It develops advanced knowledge of legal issues affecting international business, including trade law, financial crimes, intellectual property, company law, and corporate governance. The programme is suitable for both law and non-law graduates and supports progression to an LLM via credit transfer routes, typically through a dissertation-only top-up.
whoItsFor: Non-law graduates with business backgrounds, law graduates seeking specialisation, compliance professionals, and practitioners working in international trade or regulation.
whatYoullLearn: International trade law; commercial trust law; company law and corporate governance; intellectual property law; financial crime law; legal research and academic writing.
entryRequirements: Applicants must be aged 21 or over and normally hold a Level 6 qualification or equivalent. Applicants with substantial professional experience may be considered.
duration: Flexible study up to 5 years to complete
delivery: Fully online with guided learning, assignments, and tutor support
priceNote: Pricing details are available on our tuition fees page. Flexible payment options are available. A free laptop is included for learners who pay in full (terms and conditions apply).

The programme blends theory with practical application, equipping learners to improve engagement, motivation, and change management. It supports career progression in senior management, HR, organisational development, and consultancy.
